DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluated the safety and efficacy of ranibizumab on retinal edema and visual acuity in patients with diabetic macular edema with center involvement.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Efficacy of Ranibizumab in Diabetic Macular Edema With Center Involvement
DOC.criteria: Diabetic macular edema with center involvement in at least one eye Type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus diagnosed 2 years prior to screening Laser photocoagulation in the study eye can be withheld for at least 3 months after randomization Patients with uncontrolled systemic or ocular diseases Have any history of any intraocular surgery in the study eye within the past 6 months preceding screening Conditions that require chronic concomitant therapy with systemic or topical ocular corticosteroids Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria applied to the study.
DOC.keyword: Diabetic macular edema with center involvement
